pets.name: Luna
pets.personality: Luna is a calm, affectionate cat who loves to curl up and cuddle. She is independent but enjoys spending time with her human companions.
pets.medicalInfo: Luna has been spayed and is up to date on her vaccinations, including rabies and feline leukemia.
pets.biography: Hi, I’m Luna! I’ve had a pretty adventurous life so far, but now I’m ready to find a forever home where I can relax and enjoy some good company. I love finding sunny spots to nap and I have the sweetest purr when I’m happy.
pets.aboutPet: Luna is a 3-year-old Siamese cat with a gentle nature. She is looking for a calm household where she can be pampered and loved. Luna is great with children and other pets, making her an excellent addition to a loving family.

pets.name: Max
pets.personality: Max is an energetic and playful dog who loves to run and play fetch. He is friendly with everyone and always excited to meet new people and dogs.
pets.medicalInfo: Max has received all his vaccinations, including rabies and parvovirus. He has also been neutered.
pets.biography: Hey, I’m Max! I’m a young, energetic lab who loves to have fun. My favorite activities include playing fetch, swimming, and going on long walks. I’m looking for a family that loves outdoor adventures as much as I do!
pets.aboutPet: Max is a 2-year-old Labrador with boundless energy. He needs an active home that can provide him with plenty of exercise and mental stimulation. Max is great with kids and would thrive in a family that enjoys spending time outdoors.

products.name: Purina Cat Chow
products.description: Purina Cat Chow is a high-quality cat food that provides essential nutrients for a healthy and happy cat.

products.name: Royal Canin Puppy
products.description: Royal Canin Puppy food provides a balanced diet rich in vitamins and proteins to support the growth of your puppy.
